item.title: Project 2: Sentiment Analysis on Latest Avengers Movies with Tweets
item.description: Scraped twitter tweets using Twitter Scraper Successfully applied VADER sentimental analysis tool to get peoples sentiments Applied Langdetect to extract English (‘en’) language tweets Compared Avengers: Endgame 2019 movie sentiments to previous year Avengers: Infinity war movie Link to GitHub Repository
